Module main.model
Package main.controller

Class ModifyPartController

java.lang.Object
main.controller.ModifyPartController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyPartController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class handles the modification of an existing part component. This class also handles the form attributes changing between inhouse -or- outsourced radio buttons.

  • Method Details

    • setLabel

      public void setLabel(String btnID)
      This method dynamically changes the window label to reflect "Modify Part" -or- "Add Part". Uses the btnID param from the ActionEvent of the mouseclick, to go through a switch statement to determine the text for formlabel.
      Parameters:
      btnID -

    • partSceneToggle

      public void partSceneToggle(boolean switched)
      This method Toggles the In-House & OutSource Fields on the add/modify part form(s). Uses the actionEvent passed into it by listening for the toggle of the two radio buttons. Determines which radio button is active through a if/else statement and hides/displays the corresponding fields.

    • partTypeToggle

      public void partTypeToggle(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)

      public void saveBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException

    • cancelBtn

      public void cancelBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Part Form Cancel Button Method. This method listens for an action event passed to it, once the cancel button is clicked it changes the view back to the main view.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException
